abilities.name: Dragon Lift
abilities.text: The Retreat Cost for each of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex and Baby Pokémon) is 0.

attacks.name: Flame Jet
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Salamence ex.
